version_description:
Additions:
- Summer Garden map
- Operation Bathtub mission
- Water Gun and Spy Pistol
- 3 new characters
- Ladders
- Cases can be bought for 150 coins
- Reload button animation

Changes:
- Redesigned 3 weapons
- Most semi-automatic weapons now fire repeatedly
- Improved touch controls
- Frag Grenade throw speed increased
- Team Deathmatch bug fixed
- XP required to level up slightly lowered
- Coin rewards changed for all game modes
-Free cases now available every 6 hours
-Many weapons rebalanced

- Balanced coin rewards to be more even across game modes
- Increased jet ski acceleration in Operation Bathtub
- 2 second spawn protection
- Summer Garden map lag reduced
- Reduced video ad coin reward to 5
- Improved camera controls
- XP received from Operation Bathtub reduced
- XP received from Infected increased
- Fixed bug where players would all join team 1 in Team Deathmatch
- Blunderbuss damage reduced
- Water gun range reduced
- G17 no longer has automatic firing

- New UI
- New map "High Noon"
- New mission "Showdown"
- New weapons Tomahawk and Sheriff Pistols
- New characters Bandit, Indian, and Sheriff
- New case types: Rare and Epic
- New custom room settings
- Enemies now die instantly
- Ads can now be removed for $0.99
- Chat toggle
- Mute players in scoreboard
- Community Spotlight
- Movement speed increased
- Weapon switch speed increased
- Grenade throw distance reduced
- Fixed shotgun bug
- Battle Rifle damage lowered

- New UI
- New map "High Noon"
- New mission "Showdown"
- New weapons Tomahawk and Sheriff Pistols
- New characters Bandit, Indian, and Sheriff
- New case types: Rare and Epic
- New custom room settings
- Enemies now die instantly
- Ads can now be removed for $0.99
- Chat toggle
- Mute players in scoreboard
- Community Spotlight
- Movement speed increased
- Weapon switch speed increased
- Grenade throw distance reduced
- Fixed shotgun bug
- Battle Rifle damage lowered

- New map "Halloween Island"
- Halloween Event started
- New characters Skeleton, Werewolf, Slender
- New item slots Trails and Hats
- New Tomahawk skin
- Quality reduced on low memory devices
- AR60 damage reduced
- Sheriff Pistols ammo increased

- Halloween Island map removed
- New map "Santa's Workshop"
- New weapon Frozen Sniper
- New equipment Sticky Ornament
- New hat, particle, and characters
- Christmas event started
- Controls editor
- New respawn screen
- Medals
- New player animations
- Free case timer and notifications
- New ammo and health pickups
- More sound effects added to melee weapons
- Warehouse map fixed
- Main Menu optimized
- Juggernaut perk removed
- Flashbang throw speed increased and detonation time reduced
- Frag Grenade detonation time increased
- Effect of weapon recoil reduced by 50%
- Lightweight perk bonus speed reduced from 25% to 15%
- Regular case max rare item chance reduced to 10%
- Assault Gun range and damage increased
- Striker range increased
- Star Saber fire rate reduced and damage increased
- 50 Cal recoil increased
- Pumpkin Hat no longer available

- Halloween Island map removed
- New map "Santa's Workshop"
- New weapon Frozen Sniper
- New equipment Sticky Ornament
- New hat, particle, and characters
- Christmas event started
- Controls editor
- New respawn screen
- Medals
- New player animations
- Free case timer and notifications
- New ammo and health pickups
- More sound effects added to melee weapons
- Warehouse map fixed
- Main Menu optimized
- Juggernaut perk removed
- Flashbang throw speed increased and detonation time reduced
- Frag Grenade detonation time increased
- Effect of weapon recoil reduced by 50%
- Lightweight perk bonus speed reduced from 25% to 15%
- Regular case max rare item chance reduced to 10%
- Assault Gun range and damage increased
- Striker range increased
- Star Saber fire rate reduced and damage increased
- 50 Cal recoil increased
- Pumpkin Hat no longer available

3.2.1:
- Fixed issues with Santa Hat
- Event Rewards menu fixed
- Snowflakes trail now follows player properly

- New movement system with Sprinting!
- Weapon Attachments, Sights and Scopes
- New Animations
- New UI and Menus
- New map Orbit
- New gamemodes Bomb Defuse and Gun Game
- Loadouts
- Minimap
- New weapon MP5K
- Redesigned Elite Rifle, AK49
- Credits

- Daily and Weekly Leaderboards with rewards
- New Tutorial
- Personal Stats
- Shipyard map remastered
- 6 New Trails and Character Skins
- Missions fixed
- Showdown mission changed
- Lag reduced
- Attachment descriptions more detailed
- Snowflakes and Santa Hat now available
- Bomb Defuse spectator mode improved
- Bomb Defuse spawn underground fixed
- Last used loadout pre-selected in loadouts menu
- Bullet hole size reduced
- Skin Creator UI updated
- Hitmarkers fixed
- Auto Select team button fixed
- Spawn protection increased by 1 second
- Assists no longer given non-team modes
- Sandstorm out of map fixed
- Improved Character/Loadout menu
- Fixed missing attachments
- Melee weapons range decreased
- 44 Magnum Skins fixed
- Assault Gun range lowered
- Assault Rifle damage decreased and fire rate increased

- New Social System
- Hip Fire accuracy increased across all weapons
- Jump height increased
- Leveling up is now easier
- Join Game Privacy setting
- Left handed mode
- Client prediction toggle option
- Display name length increased to 16
- Updated controls editor
- New in-game settings menu
- Many bug fixes, optimizations, and lag improvements
- Battle Rifle Deep Blue skin fixed
- Operation Bathtub max players reduced to 8
- Name tag size increased
- Fixed Gun Game description
- Lightweight bonus reduced
- Default Recon loadout perk is now Juggernaut
- Pirate Cove obstacles easier to climb
- Killcam now follows your ragdoll when you kill yourself
- Rare Case and Epic Case rare chances increased
- Army Rifle damage reduced
- Special Forces Rifle damage reduced
- Melee weapon ranges reduced
- Water Gun now does area damage

- 2 new maps: Secret Bunker and Strike
- 4 new weapons: MP40, Trench Gun, M1 Garand, Battle Dagger
- Remastered AR60 and Sword
- Remastered Pirate Cove
- Halloween Island map added back to the game
- Clans
- New Case System
- 4 new Perks
- 7 new Hats
- Hat Skins
- 6 new Trails
- 3 new Characters
- New Daily Rewards
- Control Layouts
- Cloud backup
- New in-game lobby menu
- New scoreboard menu
- First-person spectating
- VIP Rank
- XP Boosts
- Improved custom character creator
- Character prices reduced
- Out of map glitches fixed
- Weapons now affect movement speed
- Last online added to user profile
- Buy loadout confirmation screen
- Player profiles now visible from the leaderboards
- Muzzle Brake attachment
- Bug and glitches fixed

- AR60 fire rate increased
- Sword fire rate increased
- Assault Gun damage reduced
- Cutlass damage reduced
- Heavy Rifle damage reduced
- Vector damage reduced
- Pistol damage reduced
- Frozen Sniper fire rate increased
- Melee weapons range reudced

- Mutli-touch bug fixed
- Custom games now show XP popups
- Daily Rewards fixed
- Custom games can no longer be joined from the following menu
- Control layouts fixed
- Default control layout now used in Gun Game and Showdown
- Grenades no longer bypass spawn protection
- Free Coins button added to respawn screen
- Unlocking weapons early prices reduced
- AR60 reload time fixed
- AR60 damage slightly reduced
- Cutlass fire rate reduced
- Melee weapons range fixed
- Bug fixes and optimizations

- All case only items now purchasable
- Limited offers now give 50% off
- Fixed Mansion map crash
- Nametags are now more visible
- Party Mix now shows a description of the mode
- Adrenaline perk bonus speed reduced
- Marksman Rifle damage reduced
- Marksman Rifle fire rate and ammo increased
- Various bug fixes and improvements

- Ranked Mode
- Christmas Village map and game mode
- Christmas event started
- New Christmas hats, trails, characters, and weapon skins
- Killfeed and chat improved
- Many weapon sound effects changed
- Leveling up is now a bit easier
- Ragdoll effect improved
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Missing ammo and health pickups added to maps
- MP5k damaged reduced
- P90 damage reduced

- Ranked Mode

- Christmas event started
- New Christmas hats, trails, characters, and weapon skins

- Leveling up is now a bit easier

- Bug fixes and improvements

- P90 damage reduced

- Ranked Mode
- Christmas Village map and game mode

- New Christmas hats, trails, characters, and weapon skins

- Leveling up is now a bit easier

5.1.4: Fixed crashing issues

- Ranked Mode
- Christmas Village map and game mode
- Christmas event started
- New Christmas hats, trails, characters, and weapon skins
- Killfeed and chat improved
- Many weapon sound effects changed
- Leveling up is now a bit easier
- Ragdoll effect improved
- Bug fixes and improvements

5.1.6: Fixed crashing issues

BIG UPDATE!
- New account/login system
- New UI
- New Case system
- New Map: Jungle
- High Noon remastered
- Striker and Shotgun remastered
- New Weapons: A180, Battle Hammer, and TEK Rifle
- Loadouts now allow 2 perks
- 6 New characters
- 2 New Boots
- 2 New Gear
- 3 New Hats
- 1 New Trail
- Map bugs/glitches fixed
- Improved character creator
- Movement speed reduced
- AWP scope blur while jumping
- Army Rifle damage increased
- AWP fire rate reduced
- Many bug fixes and optimizations

- New map Frozen Caves
- New primary shotgun: Dragonbreath
- New equipment: Stimpack
- Equipment now uses cooldowns instead of ammo
- Flinch: You now flinch when taking damage
- Christmas Event started
- Damage throttling removed
- Sniper scope sway increased
- Weapon sway reduced when aiming (not sniping)
- Health regen rate increased to 10 per second
- Zombies in Infected now fight with their bare hands and have Tomahawks
- Low level FFA lobbies max level increased to 20
- Extra Equipment perk now reduces equipment cooldown by 50%
- Level-up reward reduced
- Many bug fixes and optimizations

- Cherry Bomb damage radius increased
- AR60 damage increased
- AWP ammo reduced
- Tactical SMG damage and ammo reduced
- 50 Cal damage increased, recoil reduced
- Assault gun damage and ammo increased
- Special Forces Rifle damage increased
- Sheriff Pistols recoil reduced

- Summer Garden map remastered
- 44 Magnum remastered
- New cosmetic items
- Flinch effect reduced and now applies based on damage
- Sensitivity improved and added new Aim Sensitivity setting
- Hip fire bullet spread reduced
- Christmas event removed
- Bug fixes and optimizations
- 44 Magnum recoil reduced, ammo increased

- Daily Challenges
- Parties (Play with your friends!)
- New equipment: RPG
- Warehouse map remastered
- New and improved UI
- Two new Party Mix game modes: High Explosives and FFA Snipers
- Many optimizations, bug fixes, and improvements
- Penguin character skin
- XP Boost prices reduced
- Spawn protection duration reduced by 1 second

5.2.1:
- Party invite button added to user profile menu
- RPG damage radius slightly reduced
- Bug fixes

- New cosmetic items: Gear and Boots
- New Hats and Trails
- Bundles
- New Store and Respawn menu
- Added EU Central server
- Ranked Mode disabled
- Ad button removed from respawn menu
- Case prices reduced
- Some old characters have been removed
- Trails now stay with player
- Max users in Infected increased to 12
- Base movement speed slightly increased
- Many bug fixes and improvements
- Water Gun damage reduced

- New map - Little Town
- New sniper - AWP
- Nuke Killstreak
- Singleplayer mode
- 5 new Prestige ranks
- Max level increased to 60
- Leveling up is now easier
- News menu
- Improved some weapon sound effects
- New low health effect
- Recently unlocked items now marked with "New" icon
- Team deathmatch now uses team-based spawns
- Christmas Village and Santa's Workshop maps disabled
- Sound settings fixed
- Many weapons re-balanced
- Bug fixes and improvements

- New Map: Paintball Arena
- New Party Mix mode: Paintball
- Vulcron ID
- New Custom Games with game options
- New Summer items!
- New Perk: Quickdraw
- Improved scoping system - sight attachments now zoom in
- Low health indicator disabled in some game modes
- Nametags now appear in Parties
- Striker damage reduced
- Many bug fixes and improvements

- New map: Outpost
- New secondary weapon: TEC-9
- New cosmetic items
- New UI improvements
- Ranked Mode and rewards
- Clan Chat
- New Party Mix mode: Arcade
- Clan members with the General rank can now edit their Clan logo
- Old seasonal and holiday items have been removed
- Halloween Island map removed
- You now receive Coins and Credits for leveling up
- There are now three Limited Offers
- New Items Bundle
- Bomb Defuse round start timer reduced
- New footstep sound effects
- TMP damage reduced
- Army Rifle damage reduced, recoil increased
- M60 damage reduced
- MP5K range reduced
- Many bug fixes and optimizations

- New map Haunted Mansion
- Halloween Event started
- Halloween Island map returned
- New Halloween items and weapon skins
- Health regeneration
- Client prediction removed
- Base player movement speed increased
- Ranked Mode now is based on King of The Hill
- Ranked matchmaking improved
- Many bug fixes and optimizations

- New equipment: Stimpack

- Extra Equipment perk now reduces equipment cooldown by 50%

- AWP ammo reduced

BIG UPDATE!

- Menu backgrounds are back, with a toggle for MVPs to switch to the new look

- Movement speed slightly increased

- Level up menu can now be skipped

- Halloween Event started

- Clan Chat
- Grenade speed increased

New map Ancient City
New weapons: Katana and Ninja Stars
New cosmetic items and weapon skins
Wager matches
Vibrations
Bundles
Email validation system
Melee hit detection greatly improved
Improved following menu
“Follows You” and Last Online added to user profiles
Max players increased in all game modes
Clan Logo creator fixed, added option to allow members to edit logo
Credits received from leveling up increased
Touch Controls improved
Free Credit offers fixed
Animated Weapon Skins fixed
Sandstorm ladder fixed
Fixed item and weapon skins not appearing in-game
Weapon Skin rarity show in Loadouts menu
Time between matches reduced
Custom skin limit increased to 30
Movement speed increased
Clan icons now show in the Clans leaderboard
You will no longer join games that are about to end
Max level increased to 99 for P15 players
Best Player display fixed
Blast Shield now blocks Flashbangs
50 Cal damage reduced
RPG rocket speed increased 150%
Stimpack speed increased 50%
Lots of bug fixes and improvements

Minigames: Death Run and Dinner Party
17 new Minigame rewards
New cosmetic items
Classic maps: Factory, Summer Garden, High Noon
Gifting
Player muting
Player stats save when leaving a match early
Colored scoreboard
AWP scope loses focus when jumping
Red skin color on hit fixed
Infected added to custom games
Improved touch controls
Improved cheat detection
A lot of bug fixes and improvements

- New weapons: Combat Rifle, SX2, MP7
- New equipment: Smoke Grenade
- New Death Run map: Ancient Pyramid
- New cosmetic items
- Grenade danger indicator
- Red hitmarker on kill
- Spectator mode fixes
- Lots of bug fixes and improvements
- Weapon balance changes (see full changes on the forums)

Remastered Paintball Arena map
Improved main menu graphics and UI
New cosmetics and weapon skins
Improved Party system
Player Report system
Rank icons improved
Scope-in time added to AWP
Decreased scope-in time for pistols and SMGs
Increased flinch on snipers
Movement speed while aiming increased on SMGs and Pistols, decreased on Snipers
Sniper scope crosshairs are now thinner
Screen resolution setting on PC
Respawn menu highlights weapon you were killed by and shows killer’s health
Improved anti-cheat
Max players in some game modes reduced
Post-game lobby duration increased
Spawn protection duration reduced
FPS capped at 60 on mobile
Fixed grenade jumping
Death Run restart run button
Added player heads to Clan roster
Many bug fixes and improvements

Ranked 1v1 Mode
Waterpark map
New Summer items
News Menu
New health & ammo pickups on all maps
MP7 damage reduced
Flashbang effect reduced
Temporarily removed Clan chat
Coin rewards increased in all modes
Store menu now shows owned items first
Sniper flinch reduced
Increased FOV on mobile
Lots of bug fixes & optimizations

Ranked 1v1 Mode
Waterpark map
New Summer items
News Menu
New health & ammo pickups on all maps
MP7 damage reduced
Flashbang effect reduced
Temporarily removed Clan chat
Coin rewards increased in all modes
Store menu now shows owned items first
Sniper flinch reduced
Increased FOV on mobile
Lots of bug fixes & optimizations

Additions/Changes
- Battle Royale mode
- Halloween Season Battle Pass with 30 new rewards
- Halloween Event started
- Halloween maps and cosmetic items have returned
- In-game Task progress overlay
- Tunnel added between spawns on High Noon Ranked map
- Ranked Mode Rep gain/loss calculations have been improved
- Wager Matches now cost 2 Credits instead of 5
- Ammo Pickups now replenish ammo for all your weapons, not just the currently equipped one
- Sniper scope zoom has been increased on PC
- (Mobile) VIP+ players no longer get popup ads on Death Run
- A new zombie is infected if the last zombie leaves an Infected match
- Default items can no longer be won from cases

Bug Fixes
- Fixed bug that shows you have 20 cases when you don’t
- Fixed bug that showed 2500 Credits in the XP Boost menu
- Fixed health pickup not healing
- (Mobile) Fixed Ranked cutscene lag
- Selected Server no longer resets after leaving a match
- Fixed zombies joining with guns in Infected
- Fixed Vector Muzzle Brake
- Fixed 50 Cal reload animation
- Fixed Dragonbreath and SX2 attachments
- Fixed no-clip spot in Waterpark
- Fixed Warrior Helmet not appearing on player
- Fixed many endless loading screens in main menu
- Fixed issue where you can’t join your own Custom Game set to Followers Only
- Fixed some cosmetic items that clip through player
- Fixed Marksman Web skin
- A180 damage reduced to 20

Additions/Changes
- Remastered Desert Eagle, 50 Cal, and Vector
- MVPs can now set a custom chat color
- Teammates now have green dots above their heads
- New Respawn menu
- FPS Cap setting
- (Mobile) Graphics Quality setting
- Dead players’ chat can now be seen in most game modes
- Battle Royale mode now gives event Candy
- Sniper scope lines width reduced
- Default mobile control setup slightly changed
- Certain objects/areas now have different footstep sounds in Battle Royale

Bug Fixes
- Fixed bug that caused custom skins to be reset to Outlaw skin in Infected mode
- Fixed “Unlock Early” text showing for skins/equipment in Loadouts menu
- Fixed SX2 animations
- Fixed table titles on Ranked and BR leaderboards on some devices
- Optimized the Battle Royale map performance

Additions/Changes
- Christmas Season started with new Battle Pass & Event
- Battle Royale map size increased
- Battle Pass XP can now be earned in all game modes
- Combat is now enabled in the Battle Royale waiting lobby
- Battle Pass now costs Credits
- New Christmas cosmetic items
- Christmas has come to the Little Town Map
- Santa’s Workshop and Christmas Village maps have returned
- New Event Playlist mode for Winter maps
- Elite Pass
- Task Progress overlay in-game
- Daily Sale items increased to 6
- (PC) Most text input fields can now be submitted with the Enter key
- AWP reload time increased
- RPG rocket speed increased

Bug Fixes
- Fixed Tasks
- Fixed Parties bug
- (Mobile) Fixed Controls Editor not saving changes
- Jetpack flame particles fixed
- Store menu no longer scrolls back to the top of the list after closing the item info

Additions/Changes
- Cyber Season started with new Battle Pass
- Cyber Factory map
- New cosmetic items
- Major improvements to the Skin Editor
- New Battle Royale item pick up UI
- Equipped weapon is now dropped on death in Battle Royale
- Max level for Prestige 15 players is increased to 999

Bug Fixes
- Fixed player stats menu
- Performance optimization

Additions/Changes
- Spring Season started with new Battle Pass
- Easter Island map
- Museum Death Run map
- Ranked Season 2 started with new rewards
- (PC) Full controller support
- New Party Mix mode: Showdown
- King of The Hill mode moved to Party Mix
- Kills in the Battle Royale lobby now count for XP and Battle Pass XP
- Dead players can now pick up coins in Dinner Party
- Dinner Party role selection has been changed to be fair
- Battle Royale is now fully crossplatform
- Weapon recoil increased by 25% on PC
- Diagonal movement speed reduced on PC
- End game XP/BP XP progress speeds increased
- In-game task progress notification no longer shows if task is completed
- The game will now retry login if it fails



Bug Fixes
- Parties bug fixed
- Quickdraw perk fixed
- Hollow Points/Juggernaut bug fixed
- Slow XP bar progress for level 99+ players fixed
- (Ranked) Matching with yourself or a ghost player has been fixed



Balance Changes
- AWP scope in speed slightly reduced
- Marksman scope in speed slightly increased
- Dragonbreath magazine size and range reduced
- Star Saber now does burn damage
- MP40 damage and recoil/spread increased
- P90 damage increased
- Assault Gun damage reduced
- Tactical SMG damage increased
- Frozen Sniper fire rate increased
- Katana fire rate reduced
- Special Forces Rifle recoil/spread reduced
- TMP damage reduced
- TEK Rifle damage increased
- Assault Rifle damage increased
